changeSet.author: rgalante
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'ALL', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'DECRYPT_PROPERTIES' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT CONCAT(ABS(TAMW_permission.id-1000), ABS(TAMW_role.id-1000)+5) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'ALL', 1 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'DECRYPT_PROPERTIES' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

update.where: permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'DECRYPT_PROPERTIES') AND v = 1

delete.where: permissions_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'DECRYPT_PROPERTIES')
